name: Carfu Helljam Super Super Super Early Alpha Demo
name_original: Carfu Helljam Super Super Super Early Alpha Demo
description:
This demo was released for the Indie Racers Festival! https://indieracers.com/

Carfu Helljam is an absurd cartoonish vehicle shooter set in the year 6969. Weld swords and guns onto a haunted monster truck and do flips, and customize your car to be as weird as possible!

Future versions will involve exploring a futuristic version of Sydney called Scramble City, meeting characters, doing quests, competing online, and preventing the dark forces of an unethical quadrillionaire conspiracy theorist from taking over the world.

Anyway this is super unfinished, so expect bugs and jank. I'll eventually update this to make it a bit smoother.

https://www.patreon.com/maenadgames

https://twitter.com/CarfuHelljam
